alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Foothills; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 05 at 1:46AM MDT until October 06 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. * WHEN...From late tonight through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Foothills; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins
